content.html: During the Great Resignation, people who stay are paying a loyalty tax. Data on ~20k job titles: new hires are making 7% more than people currently working in the same job. Hey managers: why not offer a retention raise instead? Commitment should be rewarded, not punished.
content.value:
During the Great Resignation, people who stay are paying a loyalty tax.

Data on ~20k job titles: new hires are making 7% more than people currently working in the same job.

Hey managers: why not offer a retention raise instead? Commitment should be rewarded, not punished.
